name: eSLIME
tagline: Easy agent-based modeling for ecology and biophysics
body:
### This website is coming soon.
The public alpha of eSLIME is about to begin. At this time, it is possible to download eSLIME in its current state, but it's not exactly usable. We will be cleaning things up and providing documentation shortly.

### Also coming soon:
A decent explanation of what, exactly, you're looking at...

### Authors and Contributors
eSLIME is developed and maintained by David Bruce Borenstein (@biologicaldynamics), as part of his Ph.D. work with Professor Ned S. Wingreen at Princeton University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
